creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: profile of female angel gliding on cloud with wings outstretched, blowing a long horn; PR arm extended with fingers pointing to inscribed banner above
marks:
Signature, Inscription

in graphite on recto at  signed and inscribed in plate, at top: [Eaux forte
provenance: Alexis Hubert Rouart, sale in 1911; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Angel Kneeling on Clouds
